definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Shrimp, fish, scallops, seafood-tomato broth, parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 大虾，鱼，干贝，海鲜茄汁高汤，帕玛森芝士。

sentences.english: Where can I buy fresh and cheap scallops ?
sentences.chinese: 我在那里可买到新鲜又便宜的干贝？

sentences.english: However, there are more cracks, making the scallops firmness decline.
sentences.chinese: 但由于存在较多的裂纹，使得干贝的坚实度下降。

sentences.english: While waiting for the scallops, wash the broccoli and cut it into six parts.
sentences.chinese: 等候干贝蒸熟的同时，将绿花椰菜洗净，切成六朵。

sentences.english: Crad Meat and Caviar, Hoem Smoked Scallop, Tataki Tuna Fish.
sentences.chinese: 蟹肉鱼子酱，自制核桃木熏干贝，霜烧鲔鱼。

sentences.english: The dinner started with club remmendation of Asian pan seared scollop with vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴上开始首菜亚洲干贝与蔬菜。

sentences.english: Pour half of the steamed water from step one onto the broccoli and scallops.
sentences.chinese: 将步骤一剩馀的一半干贝水淋在绿花椰菜与干贝上。

sentences.english: Pour half of the steamed water from step one onto the broccoli and scallops.
sentences.chinese: 将步骤一剩馀的一半干贝水淋在绿花椰菜与干贝上。

sentences.english: Will you keep the oysters, or should I get the scallops for you?
sentences.chinese: 您要留着这些牡蛎，还是我去换干贝给您？

definition: donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap
(seafood) adductor muscle of a scallop or pen shell
